tool_description: Convert GPS coordinate to an address and place information.
name: GPS coordinate to address
title: GPS coordinate to address

api_list.name: Reverse Geocoding
api_list.description: Lookup an address and place information by coordinate or GPS location

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Desired result granularity  (country, state, city, postcode, street, or amenity)

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Preferable results language code (en, de, it, fr)
